text:
Pacsa
Pacsa is a town in Zala County.
Understand
Pacsa was first mentioned in 1256. It was elevated to town status in 2009.
This article includes travel-related information not only for Pacsa, but also for the surrounding rural areas.
By train
The closest railway station is Zalaszentmihály-Pacsa, where you can transfer to regional buses towards Pacsa. There are no direct trains from Budapest-Déli pályaudvar, you have to transfer in Zalaszentiván. The whole journey from Budapest to Pacsa takes 5 hours and costs 4805 Ft.
Zalaszentmihály-Pacsa Train Station, Vasútállomás utca, Zalaszentmihály, ☏ +36 1 349-4949 , ✉ informacio@mav-start.hu . There is no ticket office, tickets can be purchased on the train.
By bus
Direct buses from Budapest-Déli pályaudvar are available once a day, which are operated by G-Busline Kft. The journey takes 2½ hours and costs 4015 Ft. More frequent buses are available from Zalaegerszeg. The journey takes about 45 minutes and costs 560 Ft.
Get around
There is no local public transport or taxi service. You can use the regional buses operated by ÉNYKK.
See
In Pacsa:
John the Baptist Roman Catholic Church (Keresztelő Szent János római katolikus templom), Deák Ferenc utca 3.
Saint Mark Roman Catholic Chapel (Szent Márk római katolikus kápolna), Szőlőhegy, Pacsa. Built in 1763 in Baroque style.
In Búcsúszentlászló:
Calvary Chapel (Kálvária-kápolna), Búcsúszentlászló. Built in the second half of the 18th century in Baroque style. Surrounded by the stations of the Holy Cross road.
Roman Catholic Church (Római katolikus templom), Arany János utca, Búcsúszentlászló. Built in 1734 in Baroque style. It's a place of pilgrimage.
In Egervár:
Castle of Egervár (Egervári várkastély), Vár út 15, Egervár, ☏ +36 20 324-2257 , ✉ reneszanszvarkastely@gmail.com . Apr 7–Oct 28: Tu–F 10:00–18:00, Sa 10:00–16:00, Su 12:00–18:00. Built around 1560 in Renaissance style. It is now used as hotel. Adult 1000 Ft; senior, student 600 Ft.
Saint Catherine Franciscan Church (Szent Katalin ferences templom), József Attila utca 1, Egervár. Built in 1511 in Gothic style.
In Ligetfalva:
Kacika Petting Zoo (Kacika állatsimogató), Ligetfalva, ☏ +36 20 489-7200 , ✉ eklerhegyszarvas@gmail.com . Su 14:00–17:00.
In Nagykapornak:
Holy Saviour Roman Catholic Church (Szentséges Üdvözítő római katolikus templom), Zrínyi utca, Nagykapornak. Built in 1779 in Baroque style.
In Söjtör:
Birthplace of Ferenc Deák (Museum) (Deák Ferenc szülőháza (múzeum)), Deák Ferenc utca 154, Söjtör, ☏ +36 92 369-039 . M–F 09:00–17:00. Built around 1860 in Baroque style. Ferenc Deák was born in this house. There is an exhibition about traditional gentry lifestyle.
Festetics Mansion (Festetics-kastély), Deák Ferenc utca 140, Söjtör. Built around 1820 in Classicist style. It is used as an elementary school.
Saint James Apostle Roman Catholic Church (Szent Jakab apostol római katolikus templom), Petőfi utca, Söjtör. Built in 1779 in Baroque style.
In Zalaszentmihály:
Saint Michael the Archangel Roman Catholic Church (Szent Mihály arkangyal római katolikus templom), Rákóczi út, Zalaszentmihály. Built in the 15th century in Gothic style.
Do
Fishing Lake of Zalaszentmihály (Zalaszentmihályi Horgásztó), Zalaszentmihály, ☏ +36 30 939-8612 , ✉ info@zszhe.hu . Artificial lake with fishing possibilities.
Horse Farm of Gyűrűs (Gyűrűsi ménes), Petőfi Sándor utca 2, Gyűrűs, ☏ +36 70 591-8762 , ✉ kovacsemese1993@gmail.com . Lunge, riding training, trail riding. Riding training: 3000 Ft.
Szépmező Horse Yard (Szépmező Lovasudvar), József Attila utca 73, Egervár, ☏ +36 30 313-8134 , ✉ info@szepmezo.com . 08:00–20:00. Lunge, riding training, trail riding, carriage tour. Riding training: 3500 Ft, carriage tour: 5000 Ft.
Buy
Coop ABC, Csány László utca 2, ☏ +36 92 568-068 . M–F 06:00–18:00, Sa 06:00–14:00.
Coop ABC, Szent István tér 14, ☏ +36 92 568-050 , ✉ info@mecsekfuszert.hu . M–F 06:00–18:00, Sa 06:00–12:00, Su 07:00–11:00.
Coop ABC, Deák Ferenc utca 1, Zalaszentmihály, ☏ +36 93 368-085 .
Eat
In Pacsa:
Vöröskő 2.0 Pizzeria, Szent István tér 1, Pacsa, ☏ +36 20 521-0263 . M–Th Su 11:30–22:00, F Sa 11:30–22:30. Traditional restaurant and pizzeria. 1890 Ft, pizza: 1490 Ft, hamburger: 690 Ft.
In the surroundings:
Csali Csárda, Széchenyi Ferenc út 112, Egervár, ☏ +36 92 364-300 . M–Sa 09:00–23:00. Traditional restaurant with local cuisine.
Karaván Restaurant, Hármes tanya 50/3, Alsónemesapáti, ☏ +36 92 562-012 , ✉ karavanvandeglo@gmail.com . M–Sa 10:00–20:30, Su 10:00–15:00. Traditional restaurant and pizzeria with local cuisine and with specialties like prósza with sour cream. 1880 Ft, lunch menu: 900 Ft.
Kertészház Restaurant, Avashegy 6, Alsónemesapáti, ☏ +36 30 390-2652 , ✉ kerteszhaz@freemail.hu . M–Sa 11:00–21:00, Su 11:00–15:00. Traditional restaurant and pizzeria. 1600 Ft, pizza: 1090 Ft.
Korzó Restaurant, Arany János utca 4, Pókaszepetk, ☏ +36 92 953-194 . 11:00–21:00. Traditional restaurant and pizzeria with local cuisine. 1690 Ft, pizza: 1390 Ft, hamburger: 690 Ft.
Rózsakert Restaurant and Cafe, Széchenyi Ferenc út 3, Egervár, ☏ +36 30 514-2714 . 10:00–22:00. Traditional restaurant and pizzeria with local cuisine and with specialties like deer stew with porcini and dödölle. 1590 Ft, pizza: 1250 Ft.
Rózsakő Csárda, Rákóczi Ferenc utca 7, Zalaszentmihály, ☏ +36 30 820-4829 , ✉ francsics.tomi@freemail.hu . Tu–Sa 12:00–22:00. Traditional restaurant.
Vöröskő Restaurant and Pizzeria, Deák Ferenc utca 183, Söjtör, ☏ +36 20 433-0464 . M–Th Su 11:30–22:00, F–Sa 11:30–22:30. Traditional restaurant and pizzeria with specialties like lepény and prósza. 1890 Ft, pizza: 1490 Ft, hamburger: 690 Ft.
Drink
In Pacsa:
Kedvenc Presszó, Szent István tér 3, Pacsa, ☏ +36 30 621-3631 .
In the surroundings:
H-buli, Deák Ferenc utca 108, Söjtör. Sa 21:00–03:30. Entrance fee: 2000 Ft.
Jóker Presszó, Széchenyi Ferenc út 7, Egervár, ☏ +36 92 364-203 , ✉ bazso70@gmail.com . 09:00–21:00.
Potyka Tanya, Dr. Fülöp Valter utca 4/a, Zalaszentmihály, ☏ +36 30 403-1337 . 08:00–22:00.
Tölgyfa Presszó, Deák Ferenc utca 1, Zalaszentmihály, ☏ +36 30 612-1832 . M–Sa 06:00–22:00, Su 07:00–22:00.
Sleep
There are no accommodations in Pacsa. In the surroundings:
Aba Guesthouse, Zala utca 21, Zalaszentiván, ☏ +36 92 593-050 , fax: +36 92 323-688 , ✉ abahotelzalaszentivan@gmail.com . Check-in: 14:00, check-out: 10:30. Single room: 4025 Ft, double room: 6900 Ft. Discounts on longer stay..
Benkő Guesthouse, Fő út 61, Kiskutas, ☏ +36 92 364-525 , ✉ benkovendeghaz@geszta.hu . Check-in: 14:00, check-out: 10:00. Single room: 4000 Ft, double room: 8000 Ft.
Egervár Castle Hotel, Vár utca 15, Egervár, ☏ +36 20 324-2257 , ✉ reneszanszvarkastely@gmail.com . Apr 7–Oct 28. Double room: 15000 Ft.
Főnix Apartment House, Arany János utca 26, Nagypáli, ☏ +36 92 694 680 , ✉ nagypalitourinform@gmail.com . 9500 Ft, double room: 14000 Ft.
Misefa Castle Hotel, Béke utca 2, Misefa, ☏ +36 30 701-4384 , ✉ misefakastely@gmail.com . Check-in: 14:00, check-out: 10:00. Double room: 25000 Ft (includes half board).
Pölöskei Tó Guesthouse, Pölöske, ☏ +36 30 498-4389 , ✉ info@poloskeito.hu . Check-in: 14:00, check-out: 10:00. Double room: 8000 Ft.
Prémium Guesthouse, Dr. Fülöp Valter utca 2, Zalaszentmihály, ☏ +36 20 559-0080 , ✉ info@premiumvendeghaz.hu . Check-in: 12:00, check-out: 12:00. Single room: 12000 Ft, double room: 15000 Ft. Discounts on longer stay..
Zanati Guesthouse, Fő utca 13, Nagykapornak, ☏ +36 92 367-004 , ✉ zanatiboldizsar@digikabel.hu . Double room: 8000 Ft.
